full_summary:
# Invitation to Qualify for the Dorchester Penitentiary Condensing Unit Replacement Project

## Project Overview
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) on behalf of Correctional Services Canada (CSC) is seeking a Contractor for the replacement of condensing units (B4-B6) at three different sites within the Dorchester Penitentiary, located in Dorchester, New Brunswick.

## Project Scope
The successful Contractor will be responsible for the construction and installation of the replacement condensing units, as well as any associated electrical and HVAC work.

## Procurement Details
* Solicitation Number: WS4047606178
* Solicitation Date: June 12, 2023
* Submission Closing Date and Time: June 28, 2023, 2:00 PM ET
* Expected Contract Start Date: July 18, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2024
* Regions of Delivery: New Brunswick
* trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Contracting Authority
The Contracting Authority is Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC), located at 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada.

## Contact Information
Grant, Stewart (SPAC/PSPC)
Phone: Not available
Email: [stewart.grant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:stewart.grant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Eligibility
To be eligible to participate in this procurement, Respondents must meet the following criteria:

* comply with trade agreements, including the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* be able to demonstrate physical presence in Canada
* not be under a form of Bankruptcy, Winding up, or dissolution

## Response Instructions
All interested Respondents are invited to submit their response to the Invitation to Qualify, as outlined in the applicable solicitation documents.

# Important Dates

* Solicitation Date: June 12, 2023
* Submission Closing Date and Time: June 28, 2023, 2:00 PM ET
* Expected Contract Start Date: July 18, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2024
